metadata.synopsis: One liner to represent the Alarm spell being triggered when interacting with the workshop door, which makes a bell sound .
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interact with the workshop door without having dispelled magic first. Location: BGO_Main_A 14; 43; 140

0.speaker: 7ba14a70-ae26-42fd-81dd-cee4d18479dd
0.text: *RING RING RING RING RING RING RING RING!*
